snippet: Ken Read produced a tactical masterstroke to leave the Volvo Ocean Race wide open again Sunday by taking his Puma team past the pace-setting Telefonica into second place in the fourth leg.
abstract: Ken Read produces a tactical masterstroke to leave the Volvo Ocean Race wide open again by taking his Puma team past the pace-setting Telefonica into second place in the fourth leg.
lead_paragraph: Ken Read produced a tactical masterstroke to leave the Volvo Ocean Race wide open again Sunday by taking his Puma team past the pace-setting Telefonica into second place in the fourth leg.
